```{r pdfs}
pdfs <- function(x, nseq){
  x_n <- fitdistr(x, "normal")
  x_ln <- fitdistr(x, "lognormal")
  x_g <- fitdistr(x, "gamma")
  
  x_seq <- seq(min(x), max(x), length.out = nseq+1)
  
  x_pdf_n <- dnorm(x_seq, mean=x_n$estimate[1],
                   sd = x_n$estimate[2])
  x_pdf_ln <- dlnorm(x_seq, meanlog=x_ln$estimate[1],
                   sdlog = x_ln$estimate[2])
  x_pdf_g <- dgamma(x_seq, shape=x_g$estimate[1],
                    rate=x_g$estimate[2])
  x_pdf <- density(x, n=nseq+1)
  
  x_pdf_df <- as.data.frame(x_seq) %>%
    mutate(real = x_pdf,
      pdf_n = x_pdf_n,
      pdf_ln = x_pdf_ln,
      pdf_g = x_pdf_g)
  
  return(x_pdf_df)
}
```
